parameters.query:
select
   account.id as accountid,
   account.name as accountname,
   account.accountnumber as accountnumber,
   account.threepercentfee__c as accountthreepercentfee__c,
   invoice.id as invoiceid,
   invoice.amount as invoiceamount,
   invoice.status as invoicestatus,
   invoice.balance as invoicebalance,
   invoice.sourceid as invoicesourceid,
   invoice.invoicedate as invoicedate,
   invoice.invoicenumber as invoicenumber
from invoice 
   INNER JOIN
      account 
      on account.id = invoice.accountId 
      AND account.threepercentfee__c = 'Yes'
where
   invoice.sourceid = '{{Data.Liquid.BillingRunId}}' 
   AND invoice.status = 'Draft'
   AND not exists 
   (
      select
         1 
      from
         invoiceitem ii 
      where
         ii.ProductRatePlanChargeId = '{{Data.Workflow.ChargeID}}' 
         AND ii.invoiceId = invoice.id 
   )
